maybe next time lets not do this by hand


addi r1, r0, #3
00000000001100000000000010010011

00 30 00 93

addi r2, r0, #12
00000000110000000000000100010011

00 C0 01 13

0x13, 0x01, 0xC0, 0x00

000000001100 00000 000 00010 0010011


add r3, r1, r2
sub r1, r1, r3



break
00000000000100000000000001110011 -> 0x00 10 00 73
